briefTitle: Platelet Rich Plasma in Levator Ani Muscle Trauma
officialTitle: The Role of Platelet Rich Plasma in Supporting the Recovery of Post-partum Levator Ani Muscle Trauma
summary: Levator trauma (ballooning) often occurs after vaginal delivery. Platelet rich plasma injection after delivery showed reduced hiatal area and maintain levator muscle strength.

primaryOutcome.measure: Changes of Levator Hiatal Area During Valsava
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline (third trimester), 40 days post-partum, 3 months post-partum
